text: int max ( a , b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; return b ; } int main ( ) { int t , i , k , * * j , l ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; j = ( int * * ) malloc ( l * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) j [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( i * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & j [ i ] [ k ] ) ; for ( i = l - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) j [ i ] [ k ] += max ( j [ i + 1 ] [ k ] , j [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , j [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
